001
002package com.commercetools.api.models.common;
003
004import java.util.Optional;
005
006public interface BaseAddressMixin {
007    public String getKey();
008
009    public String getCountry();
010
011    public String getTitle();
012
013    public String getSalutation();
014
015    public String getFirstName();
016
017    public String getLastName();
018
019    public String getStreetName();
020
021    public String getStreetNumber();
022
023    public String getAdditionalStreetInfo();
024
025    public String getPostalCode();
026
027    public String getCity();
028
029    public String getRegion();
030
031    public String getState();
032
033    public String getCompany();
034
035    public String getDepartment();
036
037    public String getBuilding();
038
039    public String getApartment();
040
041    public String getPOBox();
042
043    public String getPhone();
044
045    public String getMobile();
046
047    public String getEmail();
048
049    public String getFax();
050
051    public String getAdditionalAddressInfo();
052
053    public String getExternalId();
054
055    public default AddressDraft toDraft() {
056        if (this instanceof AddressDraft) {
057            return (AddressDraft) this;
058        }
059        return toDraftBuilder().build();
060    }
061
062    public default AddressDraftBuilder toDraftBuilder() {
063        if (this instanceof AddressDraft) {
064            return AddressDraft.builder((AddressDraft) this);
065        }
066        AddressDraftBuilder builder = AddressDraft.builder()
067                .key(this.getKey())
068                .country(this.getCountry())
069                .title(this.getTitle())
070                .salutation(this.getSalutation())
071                .firstName(this.getFirstName())
072                .lastName(this.getLastName())
073                .streetName(this.getStreetName())
074                .streetNumber(this.getStreetNumber())
075                .additionalStreetInfo(this.getAdditionalStreetInfo())
076                .postalCode(this.getPostalCode())
077                .city(this.getCity())
078                .region(this.getRegion())
079                .state(this.getState())
080                .company(this.getCompany())
081                .department(this.getDepartment())
082                .building(this.getBuilding())
083                .apartment(this.getApartment())
084                .pOBox(this.getPOBox())
085                .phone(this.getPhone())
086                .mobile(this.getMobile())
087                .email(this.getEmail())
088                .fax(this.getFax())
089                .additionalAddressInfo(this.getAdditionalAddressInfo())
090                .externalId(this.getExternalId());
091        if (this instanceof Address) {
092            builder.custom(Optional.ofNullable(((Address) this).getCustom())
093                    .map(com.commercetools.api.models.type.CustomFields::toDraft)
094                    .orElse(null));
095        }
096
097        return builder;
098    }
099
100    public default boolean equalsIgnoreId(final BaseAddress address) {
101        return address != null && address.toDraftBuilder()
102                .id(null)
103                .buildUnchecked()
104                .equals(this.toDraftBuilder().id(null).buildUnchecked());
105    }
106}
